articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the process of quilt production and workers' hostel newly build at the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill.
					 The first leg of his visit was the process of quilt production.
					
					 He gave an instruction to build the modern process of producing varieties of good-quality quilts while giving field guidance to the mill in June last year and took measures for undertaking the project.
					
					 True to his instruction, the relevant field and officials and employees of the mill waged a dynamic drive, completing the huge modern process of quilt production by December last. It has started a full-scale production.
					
					 He went round the process to learn in detail about the production of quilts and their quality.
					
					 He was pleased to see various types of equipment in the process producing different bedclothes including quilts for winter, summer, spring and autumn and wedding and bedcover.
					
					 Saying that success of the light industrial policy largely depends on how the light industrial factories turn out goods favored by the people, he stressed the need for the mill to mass-produce quality quilts popular among them.
					
					 The next leg of his visit was the workers' hostel.
					
					 While visiting the mill in last June, he promised the construction of a new hostel for workers at the highest level. He personally chose its site and guided its layout, dispatched a powerful construction force of the People's Army and settled all problems arising in the project one by one.
					
					The soldier-builders have successfully completed the six storied hostel with a total floor space of more than 8,910 square meters in a matter of less than six months since the ground-breaking ceremony. It has a dining room, room for birthday party, sports and amusement room, bedrooms, etc.
					
					 He went round various places of the hostel.
					
					 Pleased to hear employees of the mill call the newly-built hostel a palace and hotel for workers rare to be found in the world, he emphasized that such hostel could be built in the DPRK only as it is a society for the working class. "How happy President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il would have been if they had seen such hostel," he said with deep emotion.
					
					 Noting that the hostel of the mill represents a monumental edifice showing the high level of the nation's architecture at present when a high level of civilization is being attained in the era of the Workers' Party and a golden era in construction is unfolding, he highly praised service personnel of KPA Unit 966 for having devotedly carried out the order given by the Party and gave them thanks of the Supreme Commander of the KPA.
					
					 The mill is a pivot one in the field of light industry, he said, expressing belief and conviction that its officials and workers would as ever set an example to be followed by the whole country in the year's dynamic drive for improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 He was accompanied by An Jong Su, department director of the C.C., WPK, Jo Yong Won and Pak Myong Sun, vice department directors of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: DPRK's ICBM Development Is to Cope with U.S. Nuclear War Threat: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
DPRK's ICBM Development Is to Cope with U.S. Nuclear War Threat: FM Spokesman
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Sunday as regards the fact that the U.S. is pulling up the DPRK over its preparations for ICBM test-fire that have reached their final phase:
					 The DPRK's ICBM development is part of its efforts for bolstering its capability for self-defence to cope with the ever more undisguised nuclear war threat from the U.S.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. is crying out for tightening sanctions to pressurize the DPRK, terming the entirely just rocket launch preparations of the latter "provocation" and "threat." This reminds one of a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 A U.S. deputy secretary of State spouted rubbish on January 5 that threat from north Korea has reached an extreme pitch and sanctions aimed at pressurizing north Korea would as ever continue no matter what administration may establish in the U.S.
					
					 Some pseudo-experts and conservative media are busy joining the Obama group in putting pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 Explicitly speaking again, the U.S. is wholly to blame for pushing the DPRK to have developed ICBM as it has desperately resorted to anachronistic policy hostile toward the DPRK for decades to encroach upon its sovereignty and vital rights.
					
					 Despite the unheard-of harsh sanctions and pressure, the DPRK developed H-bomb and had access to standardized nuclear warheads by bolstering up its nuclear weapons on a high level at an unimaginably high speed on the strength of self-development.
					
					 The ICBM will be launched anytime and anywhere determined by the supreme headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un clarified that the DPRK will continue to build up our self-defence capability, the pivot of which is the nuclear forces, and the capability for preemptive strike as long as the United States and its vassal forces keep on nuclear threat and blackmail and as long as they do not stop their war games they stage at our doorstep disguising them as annual events.
					
					 Anyone who wants to deal with the DPRK would be well advised to secure a new way of thinking after having clear understanding of it.

articles.title: Group Running of Government Officials in DPRK
articles.content:
Group Running of Government Officials in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A group running by officials of DPRK ministries and national institutions took place in the capital city of Pyongyang on Sunday, the first sports day for this year.
					 Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang was seething with revolutionary stamina and optimism of those officials.
					
					 After Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, made a speech, the participants began running toward Mansudae Street and the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, divided into two groups.
					
					 The group running, a demonstration of the militant might and unity of the collective, added to the elated atmosphere of the city. 
					
					 In the wake of group running, there were mass rhythmic exercise and Taekwon-do exercise for health.
					
					 Meanwhile, diverse sports events were held at industrial establishments in Pyongyang, including the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex.
					
					 Similar events took place in provinces, cities and counties of the country.

articles.title: Winter Camping Begins at Songdonwon Int'l Children's Camp
articles.content:
Winter Camping Begins at Songdonwon Int'l Children's Camp
 Wonsan, January 8 (KCNA) -- The first batch of winter campers began camping with due ceremony at the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Sunday.
					 The campers laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned, officials and teaching staff of the Camp and campers.
					
					 A report and speeches were made.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called upon all the campers for bearing deep in mind the love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and Kim Jong Il's patriotism and consolidating the knowledge learnt at schools and training their body and mind through camping.
					
					 The campers will enjoy skiing, skating, sleighing, etc. at the Masikryong Ski Resort.

articles.title: Ten Shocking Events in DPRK in 2016
articles.content:
Ten Shocking Events in DPRK in 2016
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Juche 105 (2016) already ran out. The following are the ten shocking events made in the DPRK last year.
					 
					
					1. Completion of the Sci-Tech Complex
					
					 On the New Year's Day of 2016 the DPRK declared the completion of the Sci-Tech Complex, a grand seat of learning for all the people in the 21st century. 
					
					 The presence of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at its opening ceremony marked a historical event declaring the firm will of the Workers' Party of Korea to step up the building of a thriving country by dint of science and technology and outpace the world.
					
					 
					
					2. The successful first H-bomb test of Juche Korea
					
					 The successful first H-bomb test on January 6, 2016, was a noteworthy event in the Korean nation's history of 5 000 years as it made the DPRK imposingly rise as a nuclear power in the East. It was a solemn warning of Juche Korea to the U.S. imperialists, the mastermind of aggression and war, and their vassal forces.
					
					 
					
					3. Launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4
					
					 At 9:00 on February 7, 2016, Kwangmyongsong 4, an earth observation satellite, was launched into space, demonstrating the spirit of the great Paektusan nation. It was a demonstration of the dignity of the DPRK dashing into outer space with its own efforts, technology and resources.
					
					 
					
					4. The construction of Ryomyong Street, demonstration of Songun Korea's invincible strength
					
					 Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un declared the construction of Ryomyong Street in March 2016 when upset by the DPRK's nuclear test for self-defence and launch of satellite, the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces went desperate in their unprecedented moves to stifle it.
						
					
					5. Completion of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3, demonstration of the youth power's dignity
					
					 The Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 was completed in April last year. This served as an occasion that displayed the might of the youth power which will further prosper under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, who put forward the young people as the reserve combat unit and detached corps of the Supreme Commander, true to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's idea of prioritizing the youth.
					
					 
					
					6. The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea
					
					 The 7th WPK Congress was splendidly held in May last year, which showed the true picture of the glorious WPK and the single-minded unity of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea dashing toward the final victory by rallying the army and people with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and the self-development-first principle under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
						
					
					7. The successful test-fires of ground to ground medium-and-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 and submarine-launched ballistic missile Pukguksong
					
					 The test-fires were crucial events that confirmed the truth that the indomitable will of the DPRK army and people and the determination of the WPK precisely mean practice.
					
					 
					
					8. The nuclear warhead explosion test in September
					
					 Nuclear scientists and technicians of the DPRK decorated the September holiday with the detonation of victory, displaying the might of Juche Korea's strong nuclear attack capabilities.
					
					 The test was a solemn declaration that the DPRK is ready to mercilessly react to any provocation, as an actual counteraction to the U.S. and other hostile forces' escalated nuclear war threat and sanctions.
					
					 
					
					9. Mysterious miracle wrought in flood-hit northern part of the country
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK created new heroic myth by winning the great victory in the campaign to recover the northern part of the country hit hard by the biggest flood since the liberation of Korea between August 29 and September 2.
					
					More than 11,900 dwelling houses were built and dozens of new streets and villages emerged in a little over two months.
					
					 
					
					10.  The First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea
					
					 The Conference in December 2016 was a declaration of victors in the 200-day Campaign and a new landmark in strengthening the Party and building a socialist power.

articles.title: Reunification Programmes Common to Korean Nation
articles.content:
Reunification Programmes Common to Korean Nation
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- This year will mark the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 Joint Statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 Declaration.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that the Korean people should open up a broad avenue to independent reunification through a concerted effort of the whole nation.
					
					 The July 4 Joint Statement and the October 4 Declaration adopted between the north and the south of Korea are the charters, great programmes for reunification common to the nation.
					
					 The joint statement and the declaration indicate the ways for putting an end to military confrontation between the north and the south and bringing about detente and peace on the Korean peninsula, on the basis of reaffirming the spirit of By Our Nation Itself clarified in the Three Principles of National Reunification and the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 Their validity and vitality have been fully displayed to make the whole nation seethe with the enthusiasm for independent reunification, as they reflect the will of the whole nation to achieve the cause of national reunification by the concentrated efforts of the nation, free from interference of the outsiders.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government remain consistent in their stand to safeguard the security of the compatriots and peace of the country without confrontation between fellow countrymen.
					
					 Positive measures should be taken to improve inter-Korean relations, avoid acute military confrontation between the north and the south and remove the danger of war, thus encouraging the atmosphere of reconciliation and peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should put the issue of national reunification, the common cause of the nation, ahead of others and thus make this year a significant year to open a new phase in the struggle for independent reunification by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: DPRK's December Holidays Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's December Holidays Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars and lectures took place in Russia, Spain, Uganda and Ethiopia between December 19 and 29 last year to mark the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 5th anniversary of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership.
					 Present at the events were personages of different social standings and popular masses in those countries.
					
					 The secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the Korean people have led a happy life under the guidance of the great leaders from generation to generation, adding that the DPRK has built up its powerful strength with the Juche idea and the Songun politics to defend peace and security of the world.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain praised Kim Jong Il for having consolidated the defence capabilities of the country in every way and turned the DPRK into a full-fledged nuclear weapons state with his Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and the chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the world progressives look back upon Kim Jong Il's exploits on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of his assumption of the KPA supreme commandership.
					
					 The chairperson of the Ethiopian Committee for Remembering the Great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il said it is only the DPRK that has squarely faced up the arbitrariness of the U.S. misleading the justice of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Career and Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Career and Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Various countries and regional body gave special write-ups illustrated with photos of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk between December 21 and 28 last year to mark the 99th anniversary of her birth.
					 Russia's online magazine Lemchich said that Kim Jong Suk defended President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life in every battle field and took warm care of the revolutionary martyrs' children.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said in an article posted on its website:
					
					 It was an iron faith of Kim Jong Suk to safeguard the leader at the risk of her life.
					
					 Even after the liberation of Korea she had played the role of a bodyguard as in the days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle when she constantly held arms for defending the leader.
					
					 Her intense loyalty was based on the absolute faith in President Kim Il Sung, the destiny of the country and nation.
					
					 She will be always alive in the hearts of the Korean people as an incarnation of devotedly safeguarding the leader.
					
					 A Brazilian publishing house, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People posted articles lauding the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Suk on their websites.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by KFA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by KFA
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association (KFA) released a statement on January 2 in support of the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 His address assures one of the bright future of the DPRK, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un stressed the need to fully display the might of self-reliance and self-development and set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by important fields of the national economy including the light industry.
					
					 His instructions will prove more clearly the advantages of Korean-style socialism based on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The proposals for national reunification advanced by him in his New Year Address are just and wise guidelines for smashing interference of the foreign forces and achieving the reunification of Korea.
					
					 To bolster up the nuclear force of Juche Korea in every way will be the only way for reliably defending the sovereignty form any aggressive move.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's will to devote himself to the people vividly shows his personality as a genuine leader of the people.
					
					 His New Year Address greatly encourages not only the Korean people but also the world progressives struggling for justice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el proceso de produccion de manta acolchada y el albergue de obreras, preparados nuevamente.
					El estuvo primero en el proceso de produccion de manta acolchada.
					
					En su anterior visita a la fabrica realizada en junio del ano pasado, el habia instruido y tomado las medidas para construir un moderno proceso capaz de producir varios tipos de mantas acolchadas de buena calidad.
					
					Para materializar esas instrucciones, los funcionarios y empleados de la rama interesada y la Hilanderia construyeron hasta diciembre del ano pasado ese moderno proceso de gran capacidad y entraron en plena produccion.
					
					Recorriendo el proceso, el Maximo Dirigente se informo en detalles de la produccion y la calidad de productos.
					
					Se puso satisfecho de que el proceso produjera con varios equipos las mantas para el invierno, verano y primavera y los colchones y otros avios de la cama.
					
					El destino de la politica sobre la industria ligera depende de la aceptacion popular que tengan o no los articulos hechos en las fabricas de la rama, dijo y continuo que esta fabrica debe producir en grandes cantidades las mantas acolchadas de buena calidad muy demandadas por los habitantes.
					
					A continuacion, se dirigio al albergue de obreras.
					
					Durante su anterior visita de junio del ano pasado, prometio construir en el maximo nivel el nuevo albergue, fijo personalmente su sitio, dirigio el plan de formacion, envio un competente colectivo de constructores del Ejercito Popular y resolvio uno tras otro todos los problemas surgidos en la obra.
					
					En acato a la orden del Comandante Supremo, los constructores militares levantaron en menos de un semestre desde el inicio de la obra el albergue de 7 pisos con un area arquitectonica de mas de 8 mil 910 metros cuadrados y varias salas como comedor, cuarto de celebracion de cumpleanos, salas de juegos deportivos y de recreo, dormitorios.
					
					Kim Jong Un paso revista a varios lugares del albergue.
					
					Estoy complacido al igual que las obreras que comparan su nuevo albergue con el mejor palacio y hotel del mundo, dijo y agrego que esta construccion maravillosa puede ser levantada solo en nuestro pais, mundo de la clase obrera.
					
					Expreso en tono emotivo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il se habrian puesto muy contentos si hubieran visitado este lugar.
					
					Este albergue deja conocer la altura de civilizacion de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo siendo creacion monumental que muestra el alto nivel de la actual arquitectura de Corea donde se abre la era de gran prosperidad de la construccion, apunto y expreso agradecimiento en nombre del Comandante Supremo del EPC a los militares de la unidad 966 del EPC evaluando de altos los meritos de ellos que cumplieron perfectamente a riesgo de la vida la orden del Partido.
					
					Calificando la Hilanderia de fabrica medular de la industria ligera, manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y obreros de ella seran modelos de todo el pais en la lucha vigorosa de este ano al igual que el ano pasado.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, An Jong Su, y los subjefes de departamento de CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won y Pak Myong Sun.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana condena a EE.UU. que cuestiona los preparativos de lanzamiento de ICBM de la RPDC
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana condena a EE.UU. que cuestiona los preparativos de lanzamiento de ICBM de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada con respecto a que los Estados Unidos cuestiona los preparativos del lanzamiento de ICBM que esta en la etapa final en la RPDC, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio hoy la siguiente respuesta:
					El desarrollo del ICBM de la RPDC es una parte del trabajo para fortalecer la capacidad de autodefensa nacional frente a la cada dia mas recrudescente amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Sin embargo, el pais norteamericano habla de las sanciones y presiones calificando de "provocacion" y "amenaza" los justos preparativos del lanzamiento de ICBM de la RPDC, igual que un incendiario que grita primero "!fuego!"
					
					El dia 5, el subsecretario de Estado norteamericano chismeo que ha llegado a la etapa tan extremada la amenaza del Norte de Corea y que seguiran como ahora la sancion y la presion contra la RPDC en cualesquier administraciones norteamericanas.
					
					A esta peroracion de la banda de Obama se incorporan las gentuzas de especialistas y hasta algunos medios de prensa conservadores. 
					
					Volvemos a aclarar que el autor que nos empujo al desarrollo del ICBM es EE.UU., que durante los decenios pasados ha venido recurriendo perversamente a la anacronica politica hostil para exterminar la soberania y el derecho a existencia de la RPDC.
					
					Bajo las sanciones y presiones sin precedentes, la RPDC desarrollo la bomba H acelerando el desarrollo en el nivel alto de armas nucleares con una velocidad inimaginable apoyandose en la capacidad de autofortalecimiento y sin ninguna ayuda externa y poseyo hasta la ojiva nuclear estandarizada. 
					
					El cohete balistico intercontinental se lanzara en cualquier momento y lugar decididos por la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dijo que mientras continuen el chantaje nuclear de los Estados Unidos y sus seguidores y no dejen de realizar en nuestras propias narices los ejercicios de guerra con la excusa de que es una tradicion efectuarlos ano tras ano, la RPDC seguira reforzando la capacidad de autodefensa y de ataque preventivo centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Quienquiera que quiere tratar con la RPDC, debera conocer bien primero a la RPDC y tener un nuevo modo de pensar.
